DC CODE § 31-759

Current through December 11, 2012

chapter.identifier: 9 of this title shall be applicable to the conversion of a mutual insurance holding company formed under this subchapter to a stock company as if the mutual insurance holding company were a mutual insurance company

heading.catch_text: Conversion of mutual insurance holding company.
